name: Homixide Gang
description: '''Homixide Gang''' (sometimes shortened to '''HXG''') is an American [[Hip hop|hip-hop]] duo that was founded in 2019, and signed to [[Playboi Carti]]'s [[Opium (record label)|Opium]] record label in 2021. The group consists of Homixide Beno and Homixide Meechie. Emerging as part of the [[Underground hip-hop|underground]] Atlanta rap scene, Homixide Gang gained significant attention after becoming one of only four artists signed to Opium, contributing to the Opium label and its distinct sound.
